test.value: blunt 4k get money make money year 2000

case.state: Oh, hello, Cali! I'm glad to see you here.
Oh, hello, Nord! Thanks for really getting me moving.
It's so beautiful from up here! I've always wanted to visit Paris.
It's so warm and comfortable here.
Hello, Rin. It's nice to see you here.
Oh, hello, Vis! It's always nice to see you.
I'm glad to see you, Remmy!
Alright, I think I've found the right place.
This seems like the place.
Yui? Something seems off about you.
Would you really want to play this game in your classroom, Nagisa? In either case, I'll make sure to clean up once we're done.
This does seem like an odd choice of location, but if it's abandoned, I don't see the harm.
It's so charming in here!
I'm glad to meet another student here.
Alright, I'm ready to begin.
This should be a pleasant new experience.
Ready to start? I hope I'll be a good challenge for you.
Hmm... I'd like ~cards.text~, please.
~Cards.text~ should work.
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
I'd like ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please.
Ah, this should end my losing streak.
I feel more properly dressed for the occasion now!
I feel appropriately dressed now. Does anyone want a drink?
Hmm, that's a good combination.
I think the poker games I've played with Fuuko have really paid off.
I'm glad I was able to get out here to~background.time~. This has been nice.
I'm pleased to see a hand like this.
I'm really enjoying this game so far. Are you all having fun?
I wonder if the Light Music Club ever spent a day playing cards. They already spent days just drinking tea.
I'm not too faithful in these cards, but I can work with them.
This hand should be alright, I think.
I can work with these cards.
I'm not sure where these cards will take me...
I thought I was better than this... What am I forgetting?
Hmm... this really isn't how I wanted this to go.
I shouldn't get too frustrated, but this doesn't seem fair.
Is this really a good place to play this? It's rather unsettling.
Hmm.
I was hoping for more, honestly.
I'm not too disappointed, but I'm not pleased to see these cards.
Hmm. A poor showing.
Oh, I've heard of the sunfish, or the mola mola. They're really quite heavy too, ranging from 500 to 4400 pounds!
Happy birthday, then, Petra! I'm happy to celebrate it with you.
I'd suggest Hokago Tea Time, my friends' band, but I don't think their music fits the mood here. It's too sweet and upbeat, I'd say?
I understand that, Petra. You've been doing a wonderful job.
I've found a spot to the side, Nagisa, so you'll be safe.
Don't worry, Fina. I understand. If you want to keep talking about it, I encourage it!
I'm going to go to college, as I want to study diplomacy.
Do you need help with that, Cagliostro?
I appreciate that, Mikan! I'm glad that you do your medical duty, even here.
I'd love to explore some of the ruins in the area. I've heard there are some.
It's really a lot to conceptualize, Fluttershy. I hadn't thought about that before.
I'd like to try one, Fina. I don't know what I'd use it for, but I would like to see how it tastes.
Well, if you want to get something, I'd like for you to surprise me. I don't really have a preference.
I don't think it's sanitary to have bodily fluids on tap, Mari, but I suppose I'll keep an eye out.
I've always wanted to travel abroad. I've borrowed books and travel guides to research, and I'd love to visit large cities and historical monuments.
You don't need to take off your jacket too, Komi-san! If you'd prefer to, though, I don't think I mind.
I'm tempted to guess that you were a nurse, though that may just be because I'm associating your name with that of Florence Nightingale.
You didn't do much to keep it a secret, Saki...
I'd be happy to try, Emi. I've spent some time with the track team, but I still have a lot to learn.
I'd honestly prefer to avoid fame, personally. I'd rather help people outside of the public eye.
It really is hard to define, but I think it's a kind of connection that people share that keeps them as companions.
The Light Music Club kept joking about the word "skull", but I'm not quite sure why.
I... don't know where to start.
I'd be glad to hear your jokes, Nadia!
Whenever the Light Music Club plays "Fuwa Fuwa Time", I find myself humming it for days.
I hope you're speaking metaphorically, Bobobo.
I can teach you to swim, if you want! I'm not too skilled, but I can help with the basics.
I understand how something small can be so important, Petra. It's really quite a nice sight...
I'd consider adopting one, maybe. I'd love to raise one and care for it, but childbirth is intimidating...
I find I can lean either way, personally. The idea of being in control in such a situation...
I've thought about it, but I haven't had the nerve to ask...
I know someone exactly like that, Aoba. For as long as I've known her, my friend Yui has been lazy, but able to pick up new skills easily.
I worry I come across this way to Yui sometimes. I can't help but worry about my childhood friend.
I enjoy reading, Ignatz, and I've also been learning to sing. I'm not very good, though.
I think you might like Hokago Tea Time. They're good friends of mine, as well as a good power pop group!
If you have any recommendations, then, Gwen, I'd be happy to hear them. I've been meaning to branch out a little.
I'm happy to help, Ignatz! Be sure to take occasional breaks, and keep hydrated. If you have a practice test available, go over the questions and study according to that.
We do have a band at my school, but if you'd be willing to collaborate them, I think you could put on a really impressive show!
I'd love to, one day! At least, I'd like to visit Paris. It seems like a really exciting city!
I live a while away, May. I had to take the train to get here, though I don't mind the ride.
Don't worry, I understand! Plenty of my classmates have turned 18 recently, but they still look rather young.
I was going to go to the hot springs with Fuuko and some other friends, but it was cancelled at the last minute... I can't help but be a little disappointed that it didn't happen.
I'd like that, Ignatz. I'd love to see your artistic process.
I believe you, Ignatz. If you are into it, though, you can feel free to share.
I'm fairly certain I'm not, Megumin. I suppose if I was one, I would know.
That's a good question, really. I think I'll ask one of the workers to see the documentation.
I'm sorry, Magma Grunt. I didn't mean to blow up at you.
I suppose I can respect your play style, but don't expect me to go easy on you, Hilda.
I'd love to hear it, Sayaka. I'd love to learn more about the history of classical music.
I've been meaning to learn to play an instrument when I can, but I don't currently have experience. My friends are all in a band together, though!
We do, Myriam, though I'm sure you'll be disappointed. It's really quite good, in my eyes.
I'm glad that you're taking care of yourself, Yuno. Be careful you don't get carpal tunnel syndrome!
That's an interesting question, Heris. I really do value loyalty, especially between friends, but it shouldn't come before ethics.
I'm always sure to keep a regular schedule, and sleep at the same time every day.
I suppose I like someone that I feel comfortable talking with.
Personally, I prefer walking from place to place, but I do enjoy the shinkansen. They're fast, smooth, and pretty efficient.
I do my best to, when I can, Heris. There's a lot to see around town.
(I don't know if I should point it out, but the book is upside down...)
This might be an unconventional way to celebrate a birthday, but I thought I'd try it.
I hope you've been enjoying this so far, ~human~.
It was interesting visiting the Athletics Club. I considered joining it at some point, but I'd always been busy.
I'm not sure what club I'd choose if I wasn't a Student Council member. Perhaps the Literature Club?
I always like sitting in on the Othello Club. It's really a deceptively simple game, with a lot of strategy deep down.
I think I'd be open to starting a Cooking Club. I'd love to compare my methods with the other students, and maybe learn new recipes!
I don't know how the Occult Club was approved, if they only have two members. I didn't file their paperwork either... they just handed me a signed document, and that was that.
The Drama Club always puts on such nice shows. It's nice to spend an afternoon seeing whatever play they're putting on.
The Magic Club can really be quite endearing. I can't blame them for wanting to perfect this silly little hobby.
There's a really subtle art to photography. I always love seeing the Photography club working on their craft.
It's always nice to hear the Brass Band perform. They work so well together, and they can play both fun and pretty music.
The Choir Club always sounds so lovely. They really put on good performances, too.
I love watching the physical prowess of the Judo club. It's really quite graceful, in a sense.
I don't think my friend Mio would even consider coming here. She'd be far too shy to.
If anyone needs a pen and pad for something, I've brought one.
It's nice to see how romantic relationships can flourish, if given time.
I don't know how I was convinced to take over the Mio Akiyama Fan Club. I like Mio, but the idea of a fan club for her feels strange.
I've practiced singing for some time, but I'm still not good at it yet...
I did join the Council out of love for it, but I wasn't aiming for the Presidential role... I was shocked when the election came around.
It's not that much of a big deal at my school, Revy... I mostly just do paperwork.
I am indeed a student, Heris. I just graduated from high school, and I'm looking into studying political science.
You're correct, Mari. I'm currently the student council president. It's a lot of work, but I do enjoy the process.
I think I'm ready to lead the way. Here, I'll start with something small.
I hope you like what you see, ~lesbian~...
Don't worry, I don't mind leading here.
Very well, I'm ready to remove something.
I thought that hand would be better, but I don't really mind.
I'm willing to take another loss here. I'm still happy with how I've played so far.
I know what I'll remove this time. Is everyone else ready?
Alright, one more thing before my underwear. Is everyone ready?
I've honestly been looking forward to taking this off... Ready to see what's underneath?
Alright. It's just like a locker room.
Time for my bra, now? I... I'm ready.
Now, one last thing... I feel I'm already rather wet.
Alright, I'm ready to lead here. Follow my lead, everyone!
Alright, I'm ready to strip something.
Does it make sense to call removing something small "stripping"? The word generally implies more.
Alright, one more item.
I think I'm ready to take something else off.
This kind of shirt can often be rather uncomfortable, but I'm glad that this one's rather soft.
Alright, I can do this, then. I'm ready.
Ah... One more thing to take off.
I don't mind leading, but I still feel a little behind...
Ah, I've lost this hand? Very well.
I'll take off something small here.
Another thing to take off? Alright, then.
I'm ready for another strip, I think. I'm still decently covered for now.
I don't mind taking this shirt off, now. I can just iron it when I get home.
Alright, I'm ready to remove my bra here. Ready to see?
Alright, I'll get one last thing here.
Well, I was a member, and later president, of the Student Council in high school, but even before that, I've found it interesting.
These are technically the shoes I wear outside, and I have slippers for inside. That said, I didn't bring the slippers here.
I hope I can help you feel more comfortable with stripping, ~shy~.
This blazer is a lot more comfortable than it might look.
I don't love how school uniforms are required, but I don't mind the style.
I considered wearing my blazer open sometimes, like Ritsu and Fuuko do, but I don't think the style fits me.
I think these socks are pretty cute, honestly. Simple, but nice.
It's always so hard to get stains out of white clothing.
I've considered wearing more colorful socks, but I don't think I'd want that kind of attention.
What's nice is that these shoes just slip off.
These shoes aren't the most comfortable, really. I prefer the inside shoes.
I hadn't really thought about this much, but... I don't know how interested I am in relationships?
I think I'll take off my skirt next, then. You'll have to wait a little longer before you can see more.
These skirts don't really leave much to the imagination. I'd considered talking to administration about it, but I don't know if they'd listen to me.
Alright, I think you've all earned this one.
It's not really that exciting...
A bra can really be too constricting sometimes.
I'll just peel this off...
Ready to see what I have?
It's alright, it's alright, it's alright...
I didn't think it would be necessary, honestly.
They're off now anyway, so it doesn't matter too much.
If there's any way to find out, I guess this would be it.
This game really doesn't ask much of you, physically. Well, aside from modesty, but not much aside from that.
It can be a problem if they slip off while running, though.
Ah, I'm strangely pleased to be nude here.
Is that unusual? Though, would it matter if it was?
I'm surprisingly comfortable like this.
Ah, here we are. I can really breathe now.
That said, I don't mind standing here barefoot.
Take off whatever you want, ~name~. I don't mind!
Do you feel prepared for this? I hope so.
Ready to strip, ~name~? Take as much time as you need.
Ah, good...
Ah, your turn... Sorry, I'm a bit... distracted...
Alright, that's fine...
Feel free to take off whatever you want, ~name~.
I'd love to play, Turandot! This should be fun.
I'd love to see them, Mari! I'm sure they'd be beautiful.
I suppose I can understand worry about rising ocean levels, but I hope you don't take this too far.
It's nice to meet you, Saki. You're a student, right? I don't recognize your uniform.
Nice to meet you, Heris. Should I call you Dr. Ardebit?
How do you like to spend your free time, Saki?
That's a really cute sweater, ~name~! I'd love to add something like that to my casual outfit.
I love the look of your bodysuit, ~name~. It really suits you well.
I'm not as good at walking in high heels as I'd like to be, but you pull them off well.
I'm glad the spotlight's on you this time, if only to keep it off of me.
Ah... ~name~ lost...
I was waiting for this, ~name~...
Ready to start, ~name~? I'm pleased to meet you, by the way.
Hello, ~name~. I'm pleased to meet you here.
I don't want to come off as too excited that you're stripping, ~name~, but I can't help but show it.
Oh, I'm glad it's you, ~name~...
I'm glad to see you stripping here, if you don't mind me saying so.
This really is an interesting place to meet new people...
Oh, ~name~ lost!
I'm glad to see that you lost, ~name~...
Still having fun, ~name~? I hope so.
I'm still happy to see this, ~name~...
This game really is a bit strange, but it's harmless fun at the core.
I'm glad I got all of my student council requirements done before I got here.
A tie? I think this means we just move on without stripping...
Removing something small? I can respect that.
Onto the next round, then?
I'd have to choose my childhood friend, Yui Hirasawa! I've known her since kindergarten, and while she can be odd and irresponsible, she always comes through, and I always love to see her passion!
Hmm? Did that just disappear?
This should be a rather minor round, I think.
I... I really am interested in girls...
I haven't really thought too much about my relationship interests. I guess now's a good time to think about it.
I can't help but be attracted to you...
I can't say I agree with you anymore, Magma Grunt. Yes, there are plenty of ocean-based disasters, but this seems like a counterproductive effort.
Is that your ultimate justification, Magma Grunt? That's such an irrational solution!
Your ears are really cute, Sucrose, and they fit you perfectly! I hope people aren't cruel to you for having them.
That's your plan? Wouldn't that cause untold environmental destruction?
I do plan on keeping it going, Turandot. We'll be going to different universities, but I'll be keeping in contact.
Ready for another hand? I'm ready to try again.
I can't complain about small changes, really. It can be a good time to breathe.
I think that's a sensible choice, really.
Oh no! If you all can, please help look for Ignatz's glasses?
Let's keep moving, ~name~.
I don't think that's strange, Rosa. I might be interested in looking myself, too...
You don't need to prove yourself here! Though I do get it...
Mm, that's a decent choice.
Ah, I think I understand... It seems fitting to your personality, Noelle.
You've already won me over, ~name~...
That's a welcome change, ~name~. I do think I'd like you to strip more, though.
That's quite nice, really.
This is a nice change.
It's really time to remove that, hmm...
I hadn't really mentally prepared for this...
That's quite nice, ~name~... Without a doubt.
That's alright, ~name~... Let's move on...
Don't worry, I don't mind this.
I... I'm a bit distracted, sorry...
Are you sure you don't want to remove your shoes first, Neptune? You still have them on.
I'm glad to see what's under your dress, ~name~...
(Have I had these thoughts this whole time?)
You're honestly really pretty...
You've been good to play with, ~name~.
I... I think I'm attracted to women...
You're really quite a pleasant sight.
I... I can't stop looking at you...
You're so attractive...
Am I... am I into girls?
You're really quite attractive... I can't look away.
You look so lovely...
Your lingerie's really cute, Noire! It looks wonderful, and it suits you well.
They're so cute, Mari! They really do suit you well.
I'm glad to meet you face-to-face, Samus! Your armor was really quite impressive, but I'm glad to see you!
(Ah, poor girl. At least her scars don't look fresh.)
You're really quite attractive, Laevatein. You've made an excellent choice of bodysuit.
Wait, where did you get that bucket, Saki? It makes sense if you want to get your makeup off fast, though...
I think I've been lucky in that regard, Sayaka, as we mostly wear tracksuits for gym class. The locker rooms, on the other hand...
I wouldn't mind wearing those gym outfits, and seeing the rest of my class in them...
Ah... I didn't mean it in a suggestive way, but I'd be willing to try, in that sense.
I'm glad to see this much of you, ~name~...
You're so beautiful, ~name~...
Wonderful, ~name~... absolutely wonderful.
You look so lovely, ~name~... Thank you...
Ah... I think I'm into girls... and I'm into you.
I can't get my eyes off of you, ~name~...
You're so pretty, ~name~... I can't help but stare...
You're so beautiful, ~name~... I'm so glad you came.
Ready to show off, ~name~? I know people would be happy to see your chest.
You're really quite good-looking, ~name~, so I'm looking forward to seeing you show your chest too.
Ready to show off, then, ~name~?
This should be nice to see, ~name~.
Don't worry, ~name~! You have a really nice body.
I agree with you, Mari! I don't know if I'd want to expose my chest in public, but I'd at least want the option.
You look great, ~name~!
You really do look nice, ~name~.
You really have a nice body, ~name~!
You're really a pleasant sight, ~name~.
I'm glad to have you join me in going bottomless, ~name~.
Don't say anything disparaging about his penis, please.
Time to show your penis, then... It's alright! I'm just not used to it.
I won't let anyone judge you based on your... size, ~name~.
I'm ready when you are, ~name~. Don't worry, I won't let anyone judge you on this.
The exposure here really isn't too bad, right, ~name~?
I'm proud of you for making it this far, ~name~. I think you should be too.
It's not so bad, is it?
Does it feel better to have that out?
Thank you for having the confidence to show it. I think it'll help me feel better should it be my turn soon...
See, it's not so bad!
Do you feel better having it out, ~name~?
I'm glad to have you join me in being bottomless, ~name~.
How do you manage one so big? I guess I've just never shared that experience... Am I overthinking it?
That sure is a penis...
Interested, ~gay~? I do hope you are.
(She's babbling... It's really cute...)
Is that safe, Laevatein? If so... how?
You look wonderful, Noelle... Every last part of you.
Are you alright, Saki? Surely that's a problem...
I'm excited to see how big and soft they are...
I'm excited, ~name~... I'd love to see how big they are...
I'd love to see how small and cute they are...
I'm excited, ~name~... I'd love to see how small and perky they are...
I'm excited, ~name~... I'd love to see how soft and warm they are...
I'd love to see how warm they are, ~name~...
I'd love to see your chest, ~name~... How sensitive will it be?
Just how sensitive will your chest be, ~name~?
I'm excited to see the size of them, ~name~... and how delicious they will be...
I'm excited, ~name~... They'll be so large...
I understand going without a bra, ~name~! They can really get a bit stuffy.
I can support you in any way you need, ~name~. Perhaps that entails physical support too...
I'd love to see them, ~name~...
I'm sure you can do this, ~name~. I'm here to support you.
I'm ready to see them, ~name~, whenever you're ready.
Are you sure you're ready, ~name~? I just want to be sure.
I'm here to help if you need it, ~name~.
Mm... I've been hoping for this...
Perfect... I'd love to see your breasts...
Mmm... I'm excited to see your wonderful breasts, ~name~...
Mm, I welcome this, ~name~. I'd love to see your breasts...
I'm so excited to see your breasts, ~name~...
They'll be so nice, ~name~...
So enticing...
I want to gently suckle on them...
You'd twitch so cutely if I were to touch them...
I want to lick them...
I want to feel them, if you'd allow.
So cute... and really quite attractive...
Oh, wonderful...
They're so adorable, ~name~...
Oh... They're lovely, ~name~.
I'd love to touch them...
I can't stop looking at them, ~name~...
I want to lick them, and put my face between them...
Mmh... Delicious...
Oh... I want to feel them... and see your cute face as I do...
I want to feel them...
Oh... I want to touch them...
They look so attractive... You're really quite beautiful, ~name~...
Such nice breasts...
I want to touch them... would you allow it?
They look so soft... I want to feel them...
Such lovely breasts... I want to feel them...
Take the time you need, Rosa. Don't worry, I think your body is wonderful...
Oh... they're much bigger than average, hm? I'd like to feel for myself...
I want to push my face between them...
So soft...
(I can't look away!)
Oh, they're wonderful... I'd love to lick every part of them...
Oh my... They're so large, ~name~.
Such large breasts...
You really do have nice breasts, Bernie...
This was worth the wait, ~name~...
I don't see how that would be funny? It's just a penis.
I do think I'd like that, Sucrose... I'd love to see what you've thought of.
I'm glad it's your turn now, ~name~! I've been looking forward to this...
I'm ready to see how wet you'll be...
I wonder how wet you'll be...
I'm ready for this when you are, ~name~.
(Will it be slick and lubricated?)
(I'm really excited to see it...)
I'm ready, ~name~... Are you ready for this exposure?
Make sure she can still breathe, Jura! (Though, I'd love to be in Natsuki's position...)
Please be careful, you two! This really isn't the time for this!
I don't mind what choices people make for personal grooming, but I do think you look attractive.
That's an unconventional order, but I don't mind...
Such a cute style, ~name~...
Such a cute design, but I might be more enticed by what's beneath...
I'd love to see how it tastes, ~name~...
Mm... It's exactly what I hoped for...
Oh... Coming here was a wise decision, ~name~.
Mmh... It looks so delicious...
Perfect...
(I wonder how it tastes...)
This wait was absolutely worth it, ~name~. Thank you.
(I can't help but want to taste it...)
I currently attend Sakuragaoka High School, though I'll be graduating soon.
I think I'd like to cook you dinner, ~name~. Don't worry, you're safe here.
(Is ~name~ okay? Something seems off...)
Do you need someone to talk with, ~name~? I can help.
Don't worry, ~name~! I'm glad to have you here for cards.
You've really dressed up, ~name~! You look pretty sharp.
(~name~ seems quiet... Should I talk to them? I'll be careful.)
You look quite nice in sunglasses, ~name~!
Don't worry, you're safe here, ~name~.
You've really been so kind, ~name~. I'll return the favor any way I can.
Ah, I don't recognize your uniform, ~name~. What school do you attend?
You think so, L'Arachel? You're really cute too.
You've been playing well, ~name~, but everyone has a chance of losing sometimes.
I'm sorry you've lost so many times back-to-back... Would you want me to take the loss instead?
Would you want me to take this loss instead, ~name~? This doesn't feel right.
Very well, ~name~... What do you have here?
Another loss, ~name~? I'm ready to see what you have next.
Ready to take something off, ~name~? Don't worry, I won't judge.
I'll just keep my eyes on this, if it's alright with you, ~name~?
Another loss? Don't worry, I won't judge you on how well you play.
Ready to strip, ~name~? I've honestly been looking forward to this.
I attend Sakuragaoka High School, though I'll be graduating soon.
The rest of my day today was allotted towards exam prep, and we're permitted to leave, so I thought I'd take the time to decompress instead.
I understand that. I don't really want to remind you of work while you're here, then. You needed a break, right?
I don't mean to be rude, but will you please at least take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off quickly?
Ahh... you're getting close too...
I'm glad that you've stayed this long, ~name~.
It feels nice to be making progress here.
You're getting close too, huh...
Something more, ~name~? I'm glad to see it.
If you don't want me looking, I'll turn around. I can get the others to do so, too.
Thank you for staying here, ~name~.
That's a solid enough choice, ~name~. Sorry, but I'm a bit distracted at the moment.
I think you've made a good choice, regarding what to take off.
I wonder if anyone would be interested in starting a Poker Club. My school has clubs for Go and Othello, but not one for card games.
This is nice, really.
I usually prefer to deal during card games, but I appreciate the chance to just play.
There's no pressure to take things off right away. I prefer to go slowly and deliberately.
When I hear people talking about strip poker, they always mention the revealing parts, but never the earlier stages.
Hmm. I can't say I was expecting a lot here.
I always like sitting in on clubs around the school.
I'm sorry if I'm not that invested in you removing that. I'm just distracted.
The rules in my school aren't too strict regarding accessories, but that's mostly in regards to hair clips and jewelry.
I like to accessorize in my casual outfits, though I don't do much in my school uniform.
Your confidence is really helping me feel better about being here.
I think I'd like to try one.
Those are quite the nice gloves, ~name~.
I'd love to feel your hands on me, ~name~, gloves on or not.
That's a really cute apron, ~name~! It fit you well.
Good. Ah, that's lovely.
You're quite a pleasant sight, ~name~.
That's nice, ~name~...
Oh, I really welcome that!
Let's keep moving, everyone.
That's good, ~name~. You don't need my approval, but you have it.
I'm ready for more, ~name~.
I'm pretty excited for the next hand! That was a good one.
That was pretty nice, ~name~.
Lovely, then.
Ready for the next stage of the game, everyone?
I'm sorry for my impatience, but I'm sure you can understand why.
That really wasn't so bad, was it, ~name~?
Very nice, then, ~name~!
Alright...
Can I find the rules for conduct at the Inventory? I just want to look them over.
Let's move on to the next step. Everyone ready?
Let's see how this continues from here, ~name~...
Thank you, ~name~. This is really a nice change.
You can hang that up over there. I don't want your jacket to get wrinkled.
I really love a good sweater. There are few nicer feelings than putting on a sweater fresh from the dryer.
I'm glad you feel safe enough here to take off your armor.
